QuestData.Title: Watcher Mahar Ba
QuestData.Description: It's time for you to visit the Watcher. He's been in a bit of a mood lately, and I'm not quite sure why.$b$bHead up to the top of the mage tower and check in with him. I don't have any work for you here, but I'm certain that he will.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Watcher Mahar Ba in the mage tower at Nethergarde Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: My associates were correct to send you to me. I have a problem which may threaten the sanctity of Nethergarde, and I need someone more capable than most.
